WaveSoundBuffer.freeDirectSound

Function/Meaning
Releasing DirectSound
Type
Method of the WaveSoundBuffer class
Syntax
freeDirectSound()
Arguments
None
Return Value
None (void)
Description
Releases DirectSound. All WaveSoundBuffer class objects will enter a stopped state.
Use this method to release DirectSound in environments where DirectSound and WaveMapper (MCI, etc.) playback cannot be performed simultaneously.
This method exists only on the WaveSoundBuffer class (this method is not available on objects created from WaveSoundBuffer). When using it, call WaveSoundBuffer.freeDirectSound();.
